title: Creative Pedagogical Design Process for Technology-Enhanced Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Secondary teacher training program for collaborative practice-based learning in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create innovative lesson designs using three technology-integrated instructional design models
Through collaborative practice activities, perform a peer feedback-based learning material improvement process with over 80% proficiency
Develop creative assessment rubrics using smartphone-based digital tools (Canva, Google Tools, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
